name: Sytex
headline: Project management platform for Field Infrastructure.
description:
Sytex is a project management platform for Field Infrastructure, starting with Telecom.
For example, companies like Telefonica and Claro use Sytex to build and maintain their networks.

founders.name: Mariano Lisiotti, Founder
founders.description:
Excited to simplify work for project teams worldwide.
Father of 3. Telecom Engineer, former VP Projects for South America in NERA.

founders.name: Juan Alvarez, Founder
founders.description:
Started coding mIRC scripts at 15 :)
Studied telecom engineering, but have been coding and hacking on GNU/Linux ever since those first scripts. 
Worked for a corp and kind of hated it. 
Loving the founder rollercoaster ride so far. 
Learning a lot from my wonderful daughter. 
Wannabe rock climber.

founders.name: Juanjo Ferrero, Founder
founders.description:
I'm 39 years old, born and raised in C√≥rdoba, Argentina. I'm married and have 3 beautiful kids.
I'm a full-stack developer currently focused in Front-end development.
Really like online games ü§£.

founders.name: Federico Garcia Dura, Founder
founders.description:
With over 15 years in the software industry, my passion has always been the same: being able to materialize a customer's need into a working solution.
Love gliders, my guitar and rubik's cube :)

## Your project is more than an Excel sheet
Updating project info on a sheet with many teams, technicians and work orders in parallel is a headache. With Sytex, sync everyone in real time, effortless and connected.
![Ditch the chaos of Excel sheets. Sytex keeps your teams, technicians, and work orders in sync‚Äîeffortlessly and in real time. Boost efficiency with a connected workflow. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675c7c6a50e419855e9b18fc_Imagen%20principal_Idiomas-EN.png)
## AI platform for every project team
Manage construction, maintenance, rollouts, and auditswith better insights and control.
[Construction](https://www.sytex.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Maintenance](https://www.sytex.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Rollout](https://www.sytex.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Audit & Work Orders](https://www.sytex.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
Keep Construction Projects on Track.
**Follow every detail** of your projects, from excavation to final touches, and ensure deadlines are met.
![Stay ahead in your construction projects. Track progress from excavation to completion, ensure quality, and meet deadlines with AI-powered insights.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/6761db3004363f43c559d120_EN-Construction-Projects.png)
Simplify maintenance processes.
**Adapt** your preventive and corrective maintenance processes to match your team's needs.
![Optimize preventive and corrective maintenance with AI. Adapt processes to your team‚Äôs needs, reduce downtime, and improve operational efficiency.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/67941993dfc9c821390c0fdf_EN_MAIINTENANCE_APP.png)
Streamline your Rollouts.
**Organize and monitor** every stage of your rollouts in one platform, reducing delays and improving coordination.
![Manage every stage of your rollouts in one platform. Reduce delays, improve coordination, and ensure seamless project execution with AI-powered tools.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/67afb5351e983fbe8014840b_EN-Rollout-Solar-Panels.png)
Faster Audits and Work Approvals.
**Work alongside** your field crews to track progress and approve tasks quickly and efficiently.
![Track progress and approve tasks efficiently. Enhance audit accuracy and speed up work orders with real-time collaboration and AI-powered insights.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/67afbf4d67098fb5c4ad8b59_EN-HTML-APP-Audit-Use-Cases.png)
### Achieve+with betterprocesses.
Save time, reduce errors, and improve quality across all your projects with tailored solutions.
40%
faster lead times.
100%
first time right.
### **Start Automating üôå‍****Get Started with Sytex today.**
[ Request a Demo](https://www.sytex.io/<#>)
## Validate the Quality of your work, effortlessly with AI
Certify quality right there, when it happens. Review field reports faster and**improve your quality protocols every day.**
FLEXIBILITY
### Design Field Reports
**Customize each step to fit your project needs.** Define questions, photos needed, conditionals, and more with +25 customizable types.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675c84a5dfc7c588a4aa62b8_EN_Form-Template.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675c84b4d3a37a0cd3e52fb4_EN_Sytex-AI-Review.png)
**PRECISION**
### Add quality criteria
Define in natural language what needs to be checked. Also define autocomplete.
INTELLIGENCE
### Create AI autocompletes
Define AI rules for autocompletion of steps in natural language, to make information more reliable and complete docs faster.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675cc034d4f47b0a4bc7464e_EN_Autocomplete-AI.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675c84d0680ccb9382ace246_EN_HTML-Form.png)
sync
### Work in real time
With Sytex App, field crews will complete docs with the help of AI, syncronizing all data in realtime.
**EXCELLENCE**
### Improve quality every day
Quality is not a one-time thing. Keep improving your quality criteria with edge cases, exceptions, alerts and more to guarantee having exceptional work on field.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/6761d7a81383f37b36255148_EN_Rejected-By-AI.png)
## Integrate your work in a single platform
Consolidate all your workflows in Sytex, integrating other platforms seamlessly to create, update and automate your work.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/6751a00cd4ddc6d70d5e98ae_Imagenes%20Web%20Sytex%202024-19.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/6751a01a22ad5feb0b419bca_Imagenes%20Web%20Sytex%202024-22.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/6751a0279a00d970dd0cca66_Imagenes%20Web%20Sytex%202024-20.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/6751a03233c1e000eaf22c86_Imagenes%20Web%20Sytex%202024-23.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/6751a03e2e969195493fcf41_Imagenes%20Web%20Sytex%202024-24.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/6751a0477e3cdd3f4bb06218_Imagenes%20Web%20Sytex%202024-21.png)
## Faster Teams deliver Projects Faster:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675b11dca6d4fa25027ae45f_Stars.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/6705adc437415c70e58767d5_63064b764d969a404003c11d_Claro%20\(2\).png)
Eduardo Gandino
Implementation Manager
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675b12fde09756516b115150_Quotation.png)
Sytex has transformed the way we work by digitizing our processes. Its flexibility allows us to adapt quickly to changes while ensuring traceability and reliable metrics for better decision-making.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675369e16bb8d63cafd71f96_64f7969769d785940a0a0d0b_Logo-IHS.png)
Ana Oliveira
Coordinator
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675b12fde09756516b115150_Quotation.png)
The Sytex platform has improved our operational efficiency, enabling faster responses and real-time insights. With accurate data at our fingertips, reporting and process optimization have become seamless.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/676182977e815869bc282a93_Logo-web-mi-uno-miuno.cl_.png)
Jonathan Espinoza
CEO Mi Uno
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675b12fde09756516b115150_Quotation.png)
Sytex makes it easy to track, audit, and manage field operations. From comparing project progress to controlling inventory, it helps us keep everything organized and efficient.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675369fdba379d71de9f5362_65398960251abbc84c29372c_Atis-x-44.png)
Juan Pablo Blanco
CEO Atis Group
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675b12fde09756516b115150_Quotation.png)
With Sytex, we‚Äôve streamlined our processes from planning to execution. Its real-time information and task management tools ensure we deliver outstanding results to our clients.
![Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675b0c93b54f2805e8a7abf5_left-arrow-line-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)
![Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6705aa4cc62b284441efcb87/675b0c93b54f2805e8a7abf4_right-arrow-line-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)
## Get Started with Sytex in 3 Simple Steps:
1
### Create a Project
Plan every detail from the start. Centralize tasks, assignments, and goals to kick off with clarity.
2
### Add Locations
Adapt your projects to any location. Organize multiple sites and keep all information synced in one place.
3
### Create Templates
Standardize your processes. Design reusable templates to save time and ensure consistency

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Sytex**

Founded in 2019 and hailing from C√≥rdoba, Argentina, Sytex is a comprehensive project management platform specifically designed for field infrastructure, with a notable focus initially on the telecommunications sector. The platform is currently being employed by major companies like Telefonica and Claro, empowering them to build and maintain their network systems more efficiently.

Sytex is part of the Y Combinator Batch S22, which showcases its potential and innovation. The company has a dynamic team of 22 employees and is under the strategic guidance of Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne.

**Mission and Vision**

Sytex's mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to enhance project management for field operations, leading to increased intelligence, efficiency, and quality. The platform positions itself as a critical tool for teams involved in construction, maintenance, rollouts, and audits, particularly in complex field environments. With its AI-driven features, Sytex aims to eliminate the chaos often associated with project management‚Äîespecially when juggling tasks across multiple teams and work orders.

**Key Features**

1. **Real-Time Synchronization**: Gone are the days of chaotic Excel sheets. Sytex synchronizes information in real-time, ensuring that everyone involved is on the same page.
   
2. **Tailored Solutions**: Users can customize their field reports and workflows according to their specific project needs. This flexibility means that the platform adapts to individual projects rather than the other way around.

3. **AI-Powered Insights**: By leveraging AI, Sytex not only streamlines processes but also enhances the accuracy and quality of the work being done. It allows users to track project details effectively‚Äîfrom initial tasks through to final audits‚Äîensuring high-quality deliverables right from the start.

4. **Integration Capabilities**: Sytex can seamlessly integrate with other platforms, allowing teams to consolidate their workflows and automate tasks, making the project management process smoother and more efficient. 

**Performance Metrics**

Impressive metrics underline Sytex's effectiveness‚Äîover 385,000 managed locations, 18,000 daily activities, and a whopping 13 million field reports completed, all boasting an average user rating of 4.52 out of 5. This reflects not only satisfaction but also trust from the teams using this platform.

**Getting Started with Sytex**

Getting on board with Sytex involves three simple steps:
1. **Create a Project**: Plan all details from the outset.
2. **Add Locations**: Organize all sites needed for the project.
3. **Create Templates**: Standardize processes to save time and ensure consistency.

**In Summary**

Sytex is more than just a tool‚Äîit's a transformative platform aiming to revolutionize how project management is approached in field infrastructure. By merging AI capabilities with adaptable workflows, Sytex not only makes it easier for teams to work but also enhances the quality of the outcomes they deliver. It stands as a prime example of how technology can streamline operations in traditionally cumbersome environments. To dive deeper and explore Sytex, visit [Sytex.io](https://www.sytex.io).
